credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
title: Textile
medium: Silk and metal.  Fancy satin, brocaded.
description: Only a part of complete pattern preserved: large-scale flowers brocaded in polychrome silks and silver thread (loosely wound on white silk core) on white satin ground.  Areas of taffeta weave outline the floral units.
name: Textile
